--------------------------
pyFprime.Absorb
--------------------------

Example program to call this module::

    from pyFprime import Absorb
    Absorb.main()

documentation from source code comments
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: pyFprime.Absorb
    :members: 
    :synopsis: GUI, computes scattering and absorption for a given composition
